CustomField.description: Formula field used in email templates to AE and Sales Engineer to indicate whether the Service Agreement Change checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( Service_Agreement_Change__c , "A Service Agreement Change is required. You will be updated within 48 hours.", ".")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System Maintained Field: Used in email templates to indicate whether the Service Agreement Change checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.label: Service Agreement Change VerbiageAESE
